title: Update allowlisted admin email for competition creation

requirements.text: Update the backend allowlisted admin email used to authorize competition creation from "miidhun.speedcuber@gmail.com" to "midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com", so that the user with stored email "midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com" can successfully create competitions.

quotes: unable to create competition says unable to create . chnage admin email to midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com

acceptanceCriteria: In backend/main.mo, the allowlist constant used by isAllowlistedAdmin compares against exactly "midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com".
When logged in as an Internet Identity principal that (a) is marked admin by AccessControl and (b) has userEmails[principal] set to "midhun.speedcuber@gmail.com", createCompetition succeeds.
When the stored email is any other value (including the old "miidhun.speedcuber@gmail.com"), createCompetition is rejected with an Unauthorized error as before.

constraints: Respect the single-actor backend architecture; keep all Motoko logic in backend/main.mo.
Only create/update backend/migration.mo if a state/schema migration is required (it should not be required for a constant change).
Do not edit frontend files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not implement the "mcubes user id" formatting rules or any other user profile changes (not requested in the latest message).
Do not redesign the admin UI or change generic frontend error handling beyond what is necessary for the email allowlist change.
